name: Microsoft Graph Application Module
description: Comprehensive Bicep module for creating and configuring Azure AD application registrations with full Microsoft Graph API support
author: Platform Team

changes: Complete rewrite with comprehensive Microsoft Graph API support
Added support for all Microsoft Graph application properties
Enhanced security features (authentication behaviors, signature verification)
Enterprise features (verified publisher, service management, token encryption)
Advanced credential management (key and password credentials)
Comprehensive API configuration (pre-authorized apps, known clients)
Rich metadata support (application info, logos, tags, notes)
Support for API applications with app roles and scopes
Dynamic configuration based on provided parameters

features: Complete Microsoft Graph application resource support
Multi-platform application types (Web, SPA, Mobile/Desktop, API)
Rich API configuration (OAuth2 scopes, pre-authorized apps)
Metadata and branding support (logos, application info)
Extensive parameter validation and smart defaults
